author: Donovan Russo
title: With America at home, Facebook, Google make moves to win more of gaming market
description: The coronavirus is proving that video games are made for social distancing. Amazon's Twitch, which livestreams gamers, has surged. Facebook and Google are going for more of the gaming market.
content:
Google vice president and general manager Phil Harrison shows the new Stadia controller as he speaks during the GDC Game Developers Conference on March 19, 2019 in San Francisco, California.
The gaming industry is a natural to promote social distancing durin… [+7356 chars]
